Package world

package world
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BossArenaLayout
    Week 13: Boss Arena Map Layout Theme: Final showdown arena - circular battle pit - Wall: '=' (arena barriers) - Floor: ' ' (smooth arena floor) - Enemies: Direct boss battle (no minions) - Music: Epic boss battle theme
    CastleMapLayout
    Week 13: Haunted Castle Map Layout Theme: Gothic castle with grand halls and chambers - Wall: '|' and '-' (castle walls) - Floor: ':' (stone floor) - Enemies: Knights and Ghosts - Music: Eerie orchestral theme
    DungeonMap
    Week 13: DungeonMap as Static Manager (Option B+ Hybrid Approach) ✅ KEPT: All static methods for backward compatibility ✅ NEW: Delegates to activeMap (polymorphic behavior) This allows different map layouts without changing 20+ files that use DungeonMap.isWalkable(), DungeonMap.getTile(), etc.
    DungeonMapLayout
    Week 13: Dark Dungeon Map Layout Theme: Underground dungeon with stone walls and torches - Wall: '#' (stone blocks) - Floor: '.' (cobblestone) - Enemies: Standard dungeon creatures - Music: Dark ambient dungeon theme
    ForestMapLayout
    Week 13: Enchanted Forest Map Layout Theme: Mystical forest with trees and magical clearings - Wall: 'T' (trees) - Floor: ',' (grass) - Enemies: Forest creatures (spirits, wolves) - Music: Ethereal forest ambience
    GameMap
    Week 13: Abstract GameMap for different level layouts Option B+ (Hybrid Approach): - Abstract class provides polymorphism for map layouts - DungeonMap remains as static manager to minimize refactoring - Each concrete map has different layout, characters, music This demonstrates polymorphism without changing all 20+ files that currently use DungeonMap's static methods.
